content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Production Line at (-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items right
- Stone furnace at (-25, -59) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving items right
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing iron and copper plates

### Copper Production Line at (-18, -53)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-18, -53) with coal fuel
- Wooden chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving items right
- Stone furnace at (-15, -51) with coal fuel
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving items right
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam circulation
- Electric network with multiple poles powering the facility

### Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving items right
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving items right
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected belt groups for material transport

### Coal Mining System at (41, -82)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41, -82)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure target chests contain the required items before attempting extraction
- Verify chest positions and contents before attempting to extract items

### Fuel Management Errors
- Keep sufficient coal in inventory before attempting to refuel entities
- Monitor fuel levels in critical infrastructure (boilers, mining drills)
- Implement better fuel distribution system to prevent "out of fuel" errors

### Production Line Issues
- Ensure all components of production chains have required resources
- Monitor and maintain copper plate supply for automation science pack production
- Keep production input chests stocked with required materials

### Assembly Machine Operation
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting assembly
- Maintain steady supply of both iron gear wheels and copper plates for science pack production
